artist: Artist: Wenceslaus Hollar; Engraver: After Jan Meyssens
description: self portrait of Wenceslaus Hollar facing right and looking slightly left; wearing high white collar with wide lace edge within a circular composition. 2 coats of arms below circle, the one on left belongs to his father
inscription:
Title, and Inscription

on sheet in black: [WENCESLAUS HOLLAR OBIJT LOND. 1677 Æ t 70/ Lewengren et Bereyt];  on sheet in pencil: [1-557]
title: Portrait of Wenceslaus Hollar
